main event: Multiple reports of unidentified flying objects in Melbourne, Florida, and Eberon, Virginia on various dates in August 1960, primarily witnessed by civilians.
interesting points: The object observed in Melbourne was described as a silvery, saucer-shaped craft traveling at an estimated speed of 600-800 miles per hour,Several witnesses including Mr. and Mrs. William Coker reported the sighting and called local authorities immediately,An unidentified object was recovered near Eberon, Virginia, but the Air Force was unable to locate it or provide confirmation of its recovery,Mr. James Derry reported observing a bright light moving erratically just after work, and debris was later discovered in a wooded area following a separate sighting.
sighted object: unidentified flying objects, possibly a saucer-shaped craft
witness description: Civilians including Mr. and Mrs. William Coker, Mr. James Derry, police officers, and teenagers in the area
